targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "reboots")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "reboots")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "reboots"
  )
  |> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "proximity/movement")
  |> aggregateWindow(
    every: v.windowPeriod,
    fn: last)
  |> toInt()
  |> keep(columns:["_field", "_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "reboots")

panels.description: May take up to 1 min to display

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${device}" and
    r._field == "reboots")
  |> group(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()

panels.title: ${device} Last Reboot
